name: Brooklyn Boulders(BK)
info: Classic nyc climbing gym with hundreds of routes, a great workout area and classes.  Welcoming to climbers of every level.  Busy on the weekends!

name: Brooklyn Boulders(QNS)
info: BKB's newest location.  Massive facility with a wide array of bouldering, trad and auto-belay routes.  Yoga classes, weight room and art gallery.  Great new expansion!

name: DUMBO Boulders
info: New outdoor climbing space right under the Manhattan Bridge.  Creative routes and colorful walls.  A great place to climb if you want sythetic holds without the cost of indoor gyms.

name: Chelsea Piers
info: Medium sized climbing area within the sprawling sports facility.  Nice clean space with a nice selection of trad routes and decent bouldering.  Nice locker room.

name: Rat Rock
info: Small outdoor boulder in the heart of NYC, right on the southern edge of Central Park.  Sister boulder to Cat Rock.  Contains 3 predefined routes with plenty of freedom to build your own.  Climbers are often found here on the weekends!

name: Cat Rock
info: 15' outdoor boulder in the heart of NYC, right on the southern edge of Central Park.  Has 8 predefined routes, ranging from the very easy to the advanced.  Sister route to Rat Rock.  Climbers are often found here on the weekends!
